医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
突破性研究揭示了对神经退行性疾病症状的新见解通过自然语言处理识别神经退行性疾病的临床疾病轨迹。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Groundwriting-study-unveils-new-insights-into-neurodogenic-disorder-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Groundwriting-study-unveils-new-insights-into-neurodogenic-disorder-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46b44772-39b5-4854-9dde-ecf0d052b5ef Thu, 14 Mar 2024 07:26:00 -0400 Groundbreaking study unveils new insights into neurodegenerative disorder symptoms
患有 IBD：什么应对策略最有效？一项系统评价的结果，探讨了不同应对策略对炎症性肠病 (IBD) 患者的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Living-with-IBD-What-c​​oping-strategies-are-most- effective.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Living-with-IBD-What-c​​oping-strategies-are-most- effective.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94e74836-d243-444f-aafb-56e0b9a147cb Thu, 14 Mar 2024 06:33:00 -0400 Living with IBD: What coping strategies are most effective?
研究凸显了 p-tau217 检测在阿尔茨海默病临床试验和诊断中的潜力两种商业磷酸化 tau217 (p-tau217) 检测的性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Study-highlights-pottial-of-p-tau217-assays-in-Alzheimers-clinical-trials-and-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Study-highlights-pottial-of-p-tau217-assays-in-Alzheimers-clinical-trials-and-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5c435e2-e9fd-4c56-953a-d1c0a1e9bbbb Thu, 14 Mar 2024 06:03:00 -0400 Study highlights potential of p-tau217 assays in Alzheimer's clinical trials and diagnosis
快速、易于使用的诊断测试可以挽救更多类鼻疽患者的生命在全球范围内，超过一半的患者在感染被忽视的热带疾病类鼻疽后死亡，通常是在确诊之前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Rapid-easy-to-use-diagnostic-test-could-save-more-lives-from-melioidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Rapid-easy-to-use-diagnostic-test-could-save-more-lives-from-melioidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=860b04ca-fc52-4eba-8bcf-255618962fa5 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:58:00 -0400 Rapid, easy-to-use diagnostic test could save more lives from melioidosis
创新的等离子体激活水凝胶敷料彻底改变了慢性伤口护理一个国际科学家团队已经开发出一种有效的慢性伤口治疗方法，不使用抗生素，而是使用电离气体来激活伤口敷料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Innovative-plasma-activated-Hydrogel-dressings-revolutionize-chronic-wound-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Innovative-plasma-activated-Hydrogel-dressings-revolutionize-chronic-wound-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab809ede-de02-45be-b509-b7995bdd8a7b Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:52:00 -0400 Innovative plasma-activated hydrogel dressings revolutionize chronic wound care
新研究强调饮食在对抗白癜风中的作用富含抗氧化剂的饮食和营养干预措施在减轻白癜风症状方面显示出潜在的益处，强调需要进一步研究以巩固饮食指南和传统治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Diets-role-in-fighting-vitiligo-highlighted-in-new-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Diets-role-in-fighting-vitiligo-highlighted-in-new-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bc185d8-b577-401d-ac10-3e1d192f22fe Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:43:00 -0400 Diet's role in fighting vitiligo highlighted in new research
Relugolix 和放射疗法可能是治疗前列腺癌的安全、有效的组合由大学医院 Seidman 癌症中心放射肿瘤学主席 Daniel Spratt 医学博士领导的一项高影响力研究表明，新型口服激素疗法 relugolix 与放射疗法相结合，可治疗男性局部和全身性癌症，具有安全性和有效性。晚期前列腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Relugolix-and-radiation-therapy-may-be-a-safe- effective-combination-for-treating-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Relugolix-and-radiation-therapy-may-be-a-safe- effective-combination-for-treating-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=764a9411-5e65-4c6c-947f-7806d5389cb2 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:31:00 -0400 Relugolix and radiation therapy may be a safe, effective combination for treating prostate cancer
维生素 D 水平与腰痛有关吗？一项检查英国生物银行数据的研究发现，维生素 D 状态或补充剂的使用与腰痛的发生率之间没有显着关联，这凸显了疼痛起源的复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Could-vitamin-D-levels-be-linked-with-lower-back-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Could-vitamin-D-levels-be- Associated-with-lower-back-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea68d2ba-bbe0-44ab-80f7-7f04cefb8e8 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:28:00 -0400 Could vitamin D levels be associated with lower back pain?
短期自我调节疗法可能有助于缓解长期新冠症状加州大学洛杉矶分校领导的一项新研究表明，一些长期感染新冠病毒的人可能能够通过使用短期自我调节疗法来缓解某些症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Short-term-self-regulate-therapies-may-help-alleviate-long-COVID-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Short-term-self-regulate-therapies-may-help-alleviate-long-COVID-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd0fa527-4f83-4dfc-9638-74184563fc6a Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:25:57 -0400 Short-term, self-regulating therapies may help alleviate long COVID symptoms
通过减少操作来改善手术室调度根据《医疗管理杂志》三月/四月号上发表的一项研究，减少对手术室 (OR) 调度的操纵可以提高调度准确性，并有可能最大限度地提高手术室使用率、避免延误并提高患者满意度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Improving-operating-room-scheduling-through-reduced-manipulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Improving-operating-room-scheduling-through-reduced-manipulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b131b4e9-0a73-457f-832b-33ed89efe5b3 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:21:35 -0400 Improving operating room scheduling through reduced manipulation
